full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LO GLUD GRAGS PA'I LO RIM SDE BRGYAD SPYI MCHOD TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES LO GLUD GRAGS PA'I LO RIM DU DMIGS NAS 'JIG RTEN PA'I SDE BRGYAD CHEN PO SPYI LA DMIGS NAS MCHOD TSUL 'DI NI, GA-YO BA'I SNGAGS 'CHANG TSE DBANG RAB BRTAN SOGS GZHAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS DPE SNGA MA GSUM TZAM MTHONG YANG MA 'BREL BA DANG TSAD CHE 'DUG PAS, DPAL MGON 'DI DAG MDO SNGAGS KYI PHYOGS GNYIS KA NAS 'BYUNG ZHING @007B GRAGS CHE BAR MA ZAD, GZHAN BAN BON RNAMS KYANG BKUR ZHING MCHOD 'DUG PAS KHYAD CHE BAR BSAM NAS, TZO NE'I DGON NYID DU SBYAR STE, BAR GYI YI GE PA NI TA YI LA LUNG BLO BZANG DON GRUB BO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
